title: [Gameplay] Karthus sleep walks
body:
All the voice sounds karthus has do not play during the game since the last patch.

In both Aram and normals and all skins.

replies.body:
Hey Its the FREEDOM! 

Thanks for the report! We're aware of the issue and are working to get a fix in ASAP.

Hope it comes out by 6.3.

Despite the fact that you have said this in multiple threads, Im glad you continue to tell players c:
We did try to hotfix this, but the fix didn't stick. D: Hoping to get this rolled out in 6.3.
